conbody.p: Publishing plugins allows them to be used by others, who can access and install them from .

You can publish your plugin publicly so that any Katalon users can find and install it. In addition to published plugins, you can also save your plugin as a draftâ€”this lets you test it or just use it yourself without publishing.
Once you've successfully published a plugin, on the Published plugins page, you can continue to:

li.p: Manage versions: This feature allows you to update new versions for your plugins.
